PackageOracle.name: DA_PRODUCT_GROUP_RLTD
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PRODUCT_GROUP_RLTD
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.10.394558000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,related_product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_grp_rltd_start_dt IN DATE
,product_grp_rltd_end_dt IN DATE
,product_grp_rltd_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_group_hier_level_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,related_product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_grp_rltd_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_product_group_rltd;

body.name: DA_PRODUCT_GROUP_RLTD
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PRODUCT_GROUP_RLTD
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.10.404335000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,related_product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_grp_rltd_start_dt IN DATE
,product_grp_rltd_end_dt IN DATE
,product_grp_rltd_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_group_hier_level_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product_group_rltd.add, parms=' || related_product_group_cd || '|' || product_group_cd || '|' || product_grp_rltd_start_dt || '|' || product_grp_rltd_end_dt || '|' || product_grp_rltd_reason_cd || '|' || product_group_hier_level_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_product_group_rltd a
(
a.related_product_group_cd
,a.product_group_cd
,a.product_grp_rltd_start_dt
,a.product_grp_rltd_end_dt
,a.product_grp_rltd_reason_cd
,a.product_group_hier_level_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.related_product_group_cd
,add.product_group_cd
,add.product_grp_rltd_start_dt
,add.product_grp_rltd_end_dt
,add.product_grp_rltd_reason_cd
,add.product_group_hier_level_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product_group_rltd.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,related_product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_grp_rltd_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product_group_rltd.del, parms=' || related_product_group_cd || '|' || product_group_cd || '|' || product_grp_rltd_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_product_group_rltd a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.related_product_group_cd = del.related_product_group_cd
AND a.product_group_cd = del.product_group_cd
AND a.product_grp_rltd_start_dt = del.product_grp_rltd_start_dt
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product_group_rltd.del');

END del;

END da_product_group_rltd;
